headline: Electricity is the 'new oil': 3 top energy stock picks
summary: Tortoise senior portfolio manager and managing director Rob Thummel joins Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton to discuss the energy sector (XLE) and his top stock picks in the space. Watch the video above to hear why Thummel says electricity is the "new oil." To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

content.title: Electricity is the 'new oil': 3 top energy stock picks
content.description:
Tortoise senior portfolio manager and managing director Rob Thummel joins Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton to discuss the energy sector (XLE) and his top stock picks in the space.

Watch the video above to hear why Thummel says electricity is the "new oil."

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.
